entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:43 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
